scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/pkg index.js -t node12-darwin-x64,node12-windows-x64 --output build/controller && cp plugin.json build/plugin.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build && mkdir -p "$HOME/Library/Application Support/SideKick/plugins/controllers/$npm_package_name" && cp build/controller-macos "$HOME/Library/Application Support/SideKick/plugins/controllers/$npm_package_name/plugin" && cp build/plugin.json "${HOME}/Library/Application Support/SideKick/plugins/controllers/$npm_package_name/plugin.json"
